name: AlienWar
description:
Although the art is very ugly, it is also a small game worth playing. Is this a very tangled game design, running? Will make you exhausted. Stand still? The monster will kill you. So be sure to use your excellent sense of smell to find the burger with the highest efficiency, and then use the excellent position and the thunder to throw to create the best survival time! ! !

The game time will not be very long, but I also hope to bring you a little happiness in just a few minutes, thank you for playing my game.
